discoveries.finding: Removing reference input completely improves motion
discoveries.details: Completely removing the reference input from VACE increases the amount of motion in generated videos

discoveries.finding: Dummy reference frame technique works
discoveries.details: Using a 'dummy' reference frame for the first frame allows motion establishment before reference kicks in

discoveries.finding: Color matching brings back transition artifacts
discoveries.details: Attempting to use color matching to prevent degradation reintroduces scene changes at transitions

discoveries.finding: VACE strength parameter affects all control images
discoveries.details: The strength parameter in VACE applies to the entire set of control images, not just the reference image

discoveries.finding: Two VACE nodes chained requires reference image on both
discoveries.details: When chaining two native VACE nodes (one for control, one for reference), the first node also needs the ref image to function

discoveries.finding: Delaying VACE reference improves motion
discoveries.details: Running first 2 steps without reference input, then remaining 6 with reference provides better motion while maintaining accuracy

discoveries.finding: Pure text prompts work without images
discoveries.details: The workflow can generate videos using only text prompts without any input images

discoveries.finding: Motion decreases in subsequent passes
discoveries.details: Each subsequent pass in the workflow seems to slow down motion overall

discoveries.finding: FusionX works with native VACE integration
discoveries.details: FusionX model works well with native ComfyUI VACE integration for faster generation

discoveries.finding: VACE works better with inpainting and masking
discoveries.details: VACE really seems meant to be used for inpainting and iterates on itself at each sampler when not using masking, making transitions obvious and changing content

discoveries.finding: Reference image acts as embedding vector nudge
discoveries.details: Reference image doesn't have to be followed but if it matches conditioning it reinforces it - stays cute with monster ref but no monster prompt, gets monstrous with monster prompt but not as much without monster ref

discoveries.finding: LightX causes camera artifacts
discoveries.details: If you mention 'camera' in prompts with LightX, it literally puts a camera in the video

discoveries.finding: Kontext works well for start/end frame control
discoveries.details: First real test with Kontext to set start and end frames worked surprisingly well - took many attempts with Kontext to get frames right but one shot on Wan

discoveries.finding: VACE prompt format discovered
discoveries.details: Found what appears to be the dataset and prompt format for VACE in evaluation datasets, with VACE ranking at top

discoveries.finding: Can use depth and normals together as one input using an image blend node
discoveries.details: If you use an image blend node you can use depth/normal/etc as one input

discoveries.finding: Previous VACE embeds can be chained together
discoveries.details: Each VACE encode node has a previous VACE embeds input, just set up one like you would for pose and one like you would for normal and feed one into the next

discoveries.finding: Normals need to be desaturated and blurred when used with VACE
discoveries.details: You'll want to desaturate the normal and blur it a little. Otherwise the normal completely drowns out everything. VACE wasn't trained to take normals as input, but you can trick it into using them as depth

discoveries.finding: Using end frames but throwing them away prevents unnatural transitions
discoveries.details: The trick with this WF is using the end frames to set the trajectory of the generation, but then throwing away the actual end frames for the next segment. This prevents the video from being unnatural during transitions

discoveries.finding: Split samplers prevent motion reduction when using start and reference frames
discoveries.details: With VACE if you send a starting frame and also a reference frame, the motion is severely reduced. Start sampling with no reference frame for 1 or 2 steps to get motion going, then recreate VACE conditioning with reference image

discoveries.finding: Low resolution base generation followed by upscaling works well
discoveries.details: 480x480 20 steps with teacache 0.200 for base, then upscale with 0.79 denoise. Can get base generation down to 45 seconds

discoveries.finding: Context options enable processing very long videos
discoveries.details: I have done 600 frame videos using context options set to 81

discoveries.finding: Pusa LoRA enables successful video extensions without VACE
discoveries.details: Can extend videos using pure Pusa (no VACE) with 81 frames per batch, 17 frame overlap, extended 7 times for 30 second results

discoveries.finding: Detail LoRAs can cause face issues with VACE/I2V
discoveries.details: When doing VACE or image 2 video, detail LoRAs can add too much detail to faces

discoveries.finding: Pusa improves reference fidelity and reduces degradation
discoveries.details: Pusa LoRA at strength 1.0 maintains much better likeness of reference characters and reduces the degradation effect compared to VACE alone

discoveries.finding: Phantom performance varies dramatically with frame count
discoveries.details: Phantom works well at 121 frames but produces 'midgets' and clothing inconsistency at 49 frames, 81 frames also shows degradation

discoveries.finding: Lowering LightX LoRA strength reduces cross-batch burning
discoveries.details: Using 0.5 LoRA strength instead of higher values significantly reduces cross-batch burning artifacts

discoveries.finding: WanVacePhantomSimpleV2 node can work with GGUF models
discoveries.details: If you can run the model in ComfyUI without that node then it will run with that node too

discoveries.finding: Phantom is very good at higher resolution even though it wasn't trained on it
discoveries.details: Works well at higher resolutions despite not being trained on them

discoveries.finding: Video captioning workflow available
discoveries.details: Reference to video captioning solution in different channel

discoveries.finding: FFLF phantom vace model works well for lower frame counts
discoveries.details: Best result was 832 x 480 x 121_24fps in 18mins, but worked better at 81 frames with FFLF avoiding usual Phantom problems at less than 121 frames

discoveries.finding: Fun Control 2.2 is better than VACE for video continuation
discoveries.details: Especially for scenes that would normally have huge color changes, produces better results for video extensions

discoveries.finding: Impact Pack Detailer nodes work with video when warnings are bypassed
discoveries.details: The detailer nodes are already capable of running 5D tensors, only held back by 'does not allow image batches' warnings

discoveries.finding: Memory patcher improves generation times
discoveries.details: 1600x900x81 Wan22 t2v low denoise upscaler finished in 30 minutes where it used to take 50

discoveries.finding: SEGSPreview now shows only first frame for each SEGS when it's a video
discoveries.details: This allows users to see how many SEGS it actually needs to run - if preview shows 9 segments, it will sample 9 full videos and stitch them together

discoveries.finding: New version of High 2.2 model fixes many issues
discoveries.details: Updated model available on Civitai that resolves various problems

discoveries.finding: Detailer now uses a hook system instead of intrusive wrapper
discoveries.details: VACE now connects to detailer via a detailer hook in node pack instead of wrapper in impact pack, making detailer nodes function more like they normally do with images

discoveries.finding: Face detailing working with denoise 1.0
discoveries.details: Face was completely reconstructed by the model from reference and canny control

discoveries.finding: Different samplers show huge variation in results
discoveries.details: Unexpected large differences between samplers, some handle end frame transitions poorly while others promote more variation

discoveries.finding: Blockswap with 20 blocks helps with VRAM issues
discoveries.details: Using blockswap node with 20 blocks setting makes generation work on 24GB VRAM cards

discoveries.finding: V2 model fixes pose rig showing through in final render
discoveries.details: Switching from V1 to V2 model resolves issues with pose rig appearing in output

discoveries.finding: qin_zhang_2s sampler produces nice quality
discoveries.details: Higher order samplers often freeze the background but qin_zhang_2s looks quite nice

discoveries.finding: VaceAdvancedModelPatch node can replace entire encoding node for model patching
discoveries.details: Instead of using a full WanVaceEncoder just to patch a model with LoRA, can use VaceAdvancedModelPatch node which is more efficient

discoveries.finding: Setting ETA to 0.0 eliminates fireflies/confetti noise artifacts
discoveries.details: When experiencing noise artifacts with fully_implicit_gauss-legendre_2s sampler, reducing eta to 0.0 cleans up the generation

discoveries.finding: Linear quadratic scheduler works better for low step counts than complex schedulers
discoveries.details: Beta and other complex schedulers lose their mathematical benefits at 4 steps, linear quadratic is more appropriate for 4-8 steps

discoveries.finding: Cseti's Kinestasis LoRA adds significant movement to animations
discoveries.details: Using Cseti's wan2.2-14B-Kinestasis_concept-lora at 0.45-0.8 strength on HN model adds much more movement than without, helps escape slow-mo effects

discoveries.finding: Multiple WanVacePhantom nodes can be chained but phantom images must go in the last node
discoveries.details: When chaining multiple WanVacePhantom nodes, phantom and reference images should be added to the final node before the sampler to avoid latent size conflicts

discoveries.finding: Res4lyf 3s samplers do 3 model calls per step plus 1 extra at end
discoveries.details: lobatto_iiid_3s sampler makes 19 total model calls for 6 steps (3 per step + 1 final), significantly slower but higher quality than ddim

discoveries.finding: Sigma nodes override sampler step settings
discoveries.details: When using sigmas node it takes control over sampler step settings - if sigmas calls for 6 steps but sampler shows 4, the 6 from sigmas is what actually runs

discoveries.finding: ClownsharkSampler uses base seed + 1 for noisy sampling
discoveries.details: When using ClownsharkSampler which doesn't expose seed setting, it uses the base seed + 1 for the noisy sampling when eta>0.0

discoveries.finding: HUMO works with 150+ frames
discoveries.details: HUMO can generate around 150 frames in one generation on 24GB VRAM at 1024x576, works at 121 frames at 1280x720, much longer than typical 3 second limit

discoveries.finding: HUMO works with animals at strength 3
discoveries.details: HUMO audio-reactive model works effectively with animals (pets, fish) when using strength setting of 3

discoveries.finding: VACE strength works per latent frame
discoveries.details: VACE strength is applied per latent frame - first frame uses reference latent strength, remaining frames use control latent strengths

discoveries.finding: Ultimate Vocal Remover eliminates lip twitching in vid2vid
discoveries.details: Using Ultimate Vocal Remover for audio processing prevents lip twitching issues when doing vid2vid with Infinite Talking

discoveries.finding: Race condition in Gemini API workflow
discoveries.details: Gemini response timing can cause prompts to not be ready when needed, causing repeated scenes

discoveries.finding: Browser disconnection affects Gemini credentials
discoveries.details: If browser running frontend goes to sleep or disconnects, docker container continues but frontend doesn't pass ComfyUI credentials, resulting in null responses

discoveries.finding: Path issues on Windows WSL causing index not to advance properly
discoveries.details: User reported index staying at 0 between runs due to file path configuration issues in WSL environment

discoveries.finding: Using same image for first frame and phantom reference causes problems
discoveries.details: Produces poor results with tears/distortion artifacts. Using diverse reference images instead produces much better results

discoveries.finding: Vace + Phantom merge workflow shows good character consistency
discoveries.details: User reports this combination works better than 2.2 workflows they tried, with proper character consistency when using diverse reference images

discoveries.finding: Audio scale setting affects mouth movement quality
discoveries.details: 2.0 audio scale can make characters look 'too shouty', 1.0 works better for some characters/styles

discoveries.finding: New prompt creator node allows extensive customization
discoveries.details: Node includes fields for camera motion, character interactions, lighting, facial expressions, shots, outfit rules, and physical interactions

discoveries.finding: Auto-queue functionality working in new workflow version
discoveries.details: New node can automatically queue middle runs, only requiring manual intervention for final run if less than 16 groups

discoveries.finding: Face detailer LoRA can improve facial quality
discoveries.details: Adding face detailer LoRA at 2.0 strength makes faces look better in video generation

discoveries.finding: Frame count can be extended to 121 frames
discoveries.details: Can generate videos up to 5 seconds long (121 frames) instead of the previous 3.88 second limit, though first few frames may be funky

discoveries.finding: Character description not needed in prompts
discoveries.details: Just using 'the woman' or 'the man' works fine - the model uses the reference image directly without needing detailed character descriptions

discoveries.finding: LightX and FastWan LoRAs provide speed boost
discoveries.details: Using LightX with FastWan at 4 steps: 31.49 seconds vs LightX alone at 4 steps: 70.63 seconds

discoveries.finding: Fun 2.2 Vace better at following OpenPose
discoveries.details: Fun 2.2 Vace is very good at following openpose compared to regular Vace, using only openpose conditioning for motion

discoveries.finding: Context options enable longer upscales with limited VRAM
discoveries.details: At low denoise during upscaling, context switching is barely noticeable, enabling 1080p upscale on 16GB VRAM and longer videos on better cards

discoveries.finding: Reference image ratio should match video ratio
discoveries.details: If generating 16:9 ratio video, reference image should be similar ratio for better results

discoveries.finding: Krea1 images look better than Flux images
discoveries.details: When using Flux images it looks really fake. When using Krea1 images it looks much better

discoveries.finding: Using 4 steps without FastWAN provides more cinematic results
discoveries.details: Removing FastWAN and using 4 steps gives more natural, cinematic results compared to using FastWAN accelerator

discoveries.finding: Face detailer LoRA improves face quality
discoveries.details: Custom face detailer LoRA helps make faces look better when using LightX2V, should be set to strength 1

discoveries.finding: Slow motion occurs when using fast LoRAs with WAN 2.2
discoveries.details: FastWAN LoRAs cause slow motion effects with WAN 2.2, which is why people still use 2.1 in many cases

discoveries.finding: Audio sync drift occurs across video segments
discoveries.details: Each video group gets slightly out of sync, becoming more noticeable by the end of long videos. Issue is caused by rounding/padding that adds frames of silence

discoveries.finding: Random mouth movement can be controlled
discoveries.details: Mouth moves when there's noise in audio, mentions of singing/talking in prompts, or just HUMO behavior. Can be reduced by removing vocal references from prompts

discoveries.finding: Context fields can be manually filled for consistent backgrounds
discoveries.details: Filling all 16 context fields with same background description (like 'a burning post-apocalyptic city') helps maintain more consistent backgrounds across scenes

discoveries.finding: Index node stays at 0 for 2-run videos but works for 3+ runs
discoveries.details: Workflow has bug where index doesn't update properly for videos requiring only 2 runs, but works fine for 3+ runs

discoveries.finding: QwenEdit can be improved with 'clear skin' prompt
discoveries.details: Adding 'clear skin' to prompt removes unwanted skin details like moles and blemishes that QwenEdit AIO sometimes adds

discoveries.finding: Sage attention causes black screen issues with some models
discoveries.details: QwenEdit models can produce black outputs when using sage attention, disabling it resolves the issue

discoveries.finding: High Lightning LoRA strength too high in Mega v6
discoveries.details: Mega v6 has overly bright output due to high Lightning LoRA strength, and slower performance (128s vs expected 45s on 5090)

discoveries.finding: VACE encoding can be done at lower strengths, but noise may be better
discoveries.details: Alternative approach to VAE encoding with VACE system

discoveries.finding: Context options may cause specific issues
discoveries.details: Problems only occur when using context options, needs further testing

discoveries.finding: RES4LYF samplers have unsampling/hybrid capabilities with sigma range controls
discoveries.details: AbNorsett helps with jittery trees in panning cameras but can lose face details. PEC is balanced across scheduler scale, cleans texture/color without killing detail. Lawson affects lighting/vibrance but is trickier

discoveries.finding: Unsampler node can 'duck' noise above 0.6 during unsampling
discoveries.details: Keeps base structure of noise in frames. Can push up to 0.875 but becomes seed-dependent

discoveries.finding: Switching schedulers from unsampling to resampling reduces noise without changing video structure
discoveries.details: Effective for removing 'dust' from videos using shift of 2-3 in Wan

discoveries.finding: Impact Pack dependency causes auto-queue issues
discoveries.details: VRGameDevGirl84's workflow requires ComfyUI-Impact-Pack custom node for auto-queuing to work properly. Without it, workflows won't auto-advance between runs.

discoveries.finding: 5-second duration fixes sync issues
discoveries.details: Changing video generation from 4 seconds to 5 seconds (125 frames at 25 FPS) eliminates sync drift problems, while 4 seconds produces only 97 frames instead of expected 100.

discoveries.finding: Language affects lip-sync quality
discoveries.details: French and Chinese languages produce better lip-sync results than English. Japanese, Korean, Italian, and Spanish are predicted to also work well based on phoneme similarity.

discoveries.finding: Individual video segments maintain sync better
discoveries.details: Individual generated segments (e.g., video_00003-audio.mp4) maintain almost perfect sync, but sync degrades during final video combination.

discoveries.finding: Shift value of 120 works for VACE extensions
discoveries.details: Using unusually high shift value of 120 (vs typical 4-6) helps with motion continuity in VACE video extensions without burning.

discoveries.finding: HuMo node requires frame counts that are 4n + 1 pattern
Claude AI is better than ChatGPT for code debugging
discoveries.details: Claude found a sync issue by analyzing a screenshot of workflow nodes, specifically identifying an audio crop node causing problems

discoveries.finding: FP8_e4m3fn is better than FP8_e5m2 quantization
discoveries.details: Speed might be slightly better with e5m2 but quality difference doesn't make it worth it. Q8_0 was the only acceptable GGUF quantization

discoveries.finding: Resolution more effective than steps for quality
discoveries.details: 1280x720 at 4 steps gives better quality than higher steps at lower resolution, though takes longer (50 min vs 30 min)

discoveries.finding: Fallback ffmpeg implementation works automatically
discoveries.details: Node uses imageio's built-in ffmpeg when system ffmpeg is not available: 'D:\AI\TEST\ComfyUI_windows_portable\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\imageio_ffmpeg\binaries\ffmpeg-win-x86_64-v7.1.exe'

discoveries.finding: Can re-do specific scenes by muting unwanted groups
discoveries.details: Mute all groups except the one you want to re-do, then re-run the workflow to regenerate only specific scenes

discoveries.finding: Index -1 in select images node means end frame
discoveries.details: In VACE section, the second select images node with index -1 selects the last frame

discoveries.finding: Can bypass LLM for consistent single-prompt videos
discoveries.details: For news anchor or single-scene consistency, bypass background remover nodes and Gemini LLM, use no prompts except same text in all Context nodes

discoveries.finding: CFG 1 required with LightX
discoveries.details: Negative prompts don't work as CFG must be set to 1 when using LightX

discoveries.finding: Context string has text limit
discoveries.details: The lyric string has a limit on how much text it can take, causing prompt truncation when using context strings

discoveries.finding: Humo works for ref image to image
discoveries.details: Humo is competent for reference image to image generation, needs minimum 13 frames processing

discoveries.finding: Prompt order affects character positioning
discoveries.details: Character being front and center the whole time might be related to prompt order

discoveries.finding: HuMo model babbles during instrumental sections due to needing lyrics for each scene
discoveries.details: The LLM needs a lyric for each scene or the prompts don't link up with the lyric. Pure silence for b-roll shots prevents blabber

discoveries.finding: Multiple reference images work better at 720p resolution
discoveries.details: If you give it a detailed face and also a full body reference it can use both of them at the same time on the same character. This works best at 720p resolutions

discoveries.finding: Frame count affects character consistency in Phantom
discoveries.details: When passing 3 ref characters to phantom: 49 frames produces 1 dwarf, 97 frames has wrong clothing on one person, 121 frames all look spot on

discoveries.finding: 81 frames with 14 frame overlap works well for elaborate transitions
discoveries.details: Found that 81 frames with a 14 frame overlap is pretty good too for more elaborate transitions

discoveries.finding: Latent space upscaling causes ghosting issues
discoveries.details: Every single Latent Space Upscaler causes ghosting/doubling effect in one axis when upscaling from HN to LN model

discoveries.finding: Don't let HN model denoise below 0.90 or 0.87
discoveries.details: The HN model isn't trained to remove noise below .90 or .87 so you are just wasting compute if you let it go to far

discoveries.finding: Wan S2V (Speech-to-Video) produces poor quality results
discoveries.details: Multiple users tested Wan 2.2 S2V and found it looks like shit compared to HuMo

discoveries.finding: VACE 2.2 requires different sampler than previous versions
discoveries.details: Dream Making found the culprit for issues was the sampler when using VACE 2.2

discoveries.finding: LightX LoRA causes unwanted lip movements
discoveries.details: Testing showed that LightX distill LoRAs are major culprit for lip movement when no audio is present

discoveries.finding: CFG and negative prompts can reduce unwanted lip movements
discoveries.details: Using CFG 3.0, 20 steps and negative prompts like 'talking, speaking, mouth movements, singing, yelling' reduces lip smacking better than LightX LoRA

discoveries.finding: No audio input better than empty audio for preventing lip movement
discoveries.details: Using no audio input was better than using empty audio clips for preventing unwanted lip movements

discoveries.finding: Resolution divisibility by 32 affects video quality
discoveries.details: Christian Sandor had square artifacts with 1280x720 (720 not divisible by 32), switching to 1024x576 solved all problems

discoveries.finding: Best combination of SVI Loras for clean continuations with Wan2.2 A14B I2V High Noise -> Wan HuMo 14B
discoveries.details: Workflow provides specific SVI lora settings for avoiding flash and maintaining consistency across extensions

discoveries.finding: Minimum block parameters found that suppress lipsync
discoveries.details: Frame cap seems to be 121 to avoid burn. Prompt needs to somehow indicate silence - 'standing' vs 'standing silently' makes a difference

discoveries.finding: Audio attention layers hooking more successful than band editing in HuMo embeds
discoveries.details: Greater success now but caveat is frame limit reduced from 125 to avoid burn on first frames

discoveries.finding: Color match node for video that prevents drift
discoveries.details: Normal color match nodes do matching on each frame individually to single reference causing drift when scene changes. Better to record color matching parameters from each video frame and apply to whole video

discoveries.finding: Using WanImageToVideoSVIPro on first sampler reduces color drift
discoveries.details: Made the first gen look somewhat same as the second which is good, though introduced some flash for a few start frames

discoveries.finding: Resolution significantly affects HuMo lipsync quality
discoveries.details: Moving from 512x512 to 1024x1024 resolution shows significant improvement in lipsync accuracy

discoveries.finding: SageAttention-Triton doesn't negatively impact quality as feared
discoveries.details: Can be used at higher resolutions without major quality degradation

discoveries.finding: Audio padding improves lipsync
discoveries.details: Adding 0.2s of embedded silence to the start of audio helps with synchronization

discoveries.finding: Prompting is crucial for HuMo performance
discoveries.details: Emotional direction and expression can get over-exaggerated, prompts mentioning talking/singing generate random mouth movements on first sample

discoveries.finding: Chain sampling mechanism explained
discoveries.details: Chain sampling runs first sampler for specified steps, then continues from that point with second sampler for remaining steps

discoveries.finding: Face size in pixels affects HuMo quality
discoveries.details: Resolution and size of the face in pixels is really important for HuMo performance

discoveries.finding: GGUF models work with end frames functionality
discoveries.details: GGUF models can be successfully used with end frame control nodes for better video generation control

discoveries.finding: Audio encoding precision improvements
discoveries.details: Reworked audio scaling to only apply to first 2 frequency bands for more precise lip sync control

discoveries.finding: Camera movement possible with lip sync
discoveries.details: Successfully achieved decent lip sync with camera movement using seed-sniping and proper prompting

discoveries.finding: VACE and HuMo can be combined in sampling schedule
discoveries.details: Can do HN sampling with VACE or VACE+Phantom, then switch to HuMo for LN sampling

discoveries.finding: Wan 2.1 performs nearly as well as Wan 2.2 with double sampling pass
discoveries.details: After much testing, Wan2.1 is 99.9% as good if not better than 2.2 if you do a second sampler pass

discoveries.finding: Original VACE 2.1 better at inpainting than Fun VACE 2.2
discoveries.details: Fun VACE 2.2 models forgot some things like inpainting, they are not as good as original VACE for that. When switched to original VACE with same WF it worked beautifully for first-last-frame control

discoveries.finding: Different sampler/scheduler combinations affect LoRA behavior
discoveries.details: ddim/beta + ddim/ddim_uniform will get you closer to reference image if changing likeness too much. er_sde/bong tangent and res_2s/beta57 make the inflation more extreme with nice detail

discoveries.finding: Doubling up control frames improves frame preservation
discoveries.details: If you double up the frames, it does a better job of preserving the frames in VACE workflows

discoveries.finding: Native Wan prompt scheduling works differently than frame-specific systems
discoveries.details: Uses Context Window system with pipe (|) separator method - splits prompts across context windows rather than specific frame numbers

troubleshooting.problem: Color and quality shift after several segments
troubleshooting.solution: Still being investigated - color matching attempts bring back transition issues

troubleshooting.problem: Expected tensors to be on same device error with control inputs
troubleshooting.solution: Plug the control video into the Start to End Frame node

troubleshooting.problem: Motion becoming too static with control frame and reference
troubleshooting.solution: Delay the reference input by a few steps (e.g., 2 steps without reference, then 6 with reference)

troubleshooting.problem: Long generation times on 4060Ti 16GB
troubleshooting.solution: Enable block swap (suggested 30-40 blocks), reduce resolution, ensure source images aren't too large

troubleshooting.problem: VACE Module error with checkpoints
troubleshooting.solution: VACE Module only works with wrapper, not native, and is meant for using VACE with other checkpoints - it's not a checkpoint itself

troubleshooting.problem: Control masks not connected in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Connect control masks to take advantage of masking that prevents continuation frames from changing

troubleshooting.problem: Poor quality with LightX2V LoRA
troubleshooting.solution: Use more steps in first group (20 steps) before applying speed optimizations in subsequent groups

troubleshooting.problem: First frame not matching perfectly
troubleshooting.solution: Check GGUF loaders, NAG settings, and CFG values - disable NAG and set CFG back to 1 if needed

troubleshooting.problem: Native compile setup throwing error vs wrapper
troubleshooting.solution: Use wrapper with block swap at 40 as workaround

troubleshooting.problem: Dark video output with color changes
troubleshooting.solution: Changed color match to 0, color changes depend on the image - some don't need correction

troubleshooting.problem: Can't do 4 steps without LightX LoRA
troubleshooting.solution: Put LightX LoRA back and set to 1.00 when using 4 steps

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor error at 1920x1080
troubleshooting.solution: Use 1920x1072 instead to solve the error

troubleshooting.problem: Character and setting drift in chained generations
troubleshooting.solution: Keep same reference image throughout to maintain consistency

troubleshooting.problem: Workflow freezing due to too many nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Step away from overly complex workflows, use simpler approaches

troubleshooting.problem: Kijai's wrapper MultiTalk branch crashes with VACE
troubleshooting.solution: Had to use a hacked up version of kijai's wrapper. Made VACE ignore the extra layers from multitalking cause it chokes on them

troubleshooting.problem: Normal node broke with ComfyUI update
troubleshooting.solution: Switched to NormalCrafter which works now and is much cleaner

troubleshooting.problem: 1920x1080 resolution not working
troubleshooting.solution: Either update the divisible by to 16 or change it to 1920x1072

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues with large video upscaling
troubleshooting.solution: Use context options set to 81 for default settings

troubleshooting.problem: Group nodes causing workflow issues when sharing
troubleshooting.solution: Group nodes can be buggy when sharing workflows. Split out the nodes from the group

troubleshooting.problem: High CPU usage from VideoHelperSuite nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Swapped in preview animation node and CPU usage went down to nothing

troubleshooting.problem: Dimensions error with GGUF models
troubleshooting.solution: Dimensions need to be divisible by 16 for proper operation

troubleshooting.problem: GGUF models not detected by diffusion model node
troubleshooting.solution: Cannot use GGUF models with VACE module in native - need merged model or different workflow approach

troubleshooting.problem: Triton error on 4070 12GB VRAM
troubleshooting.solution: Issue appears to be Triton-related memory problem

troubleshooting.problem: Color shift issues with VACE
troubleshooting.solution: VACE encode node may be causing color shifts - prompting matters a lot, may need prompt tweaking for each batch

troubleshooting.problem: Subgraph workflow corruption
troubleshooting.solution: Select everything in workflow, copy it, make new empty workflow, then paste to fix corruption

troubleshooting.problem: bf16 VACE module incompatibility
troubleshooting.solution: bf16 VACE module doesn't work properly with Phantom fp8_e5m2 - causes issues even when VACE not in workflow

troubleshooting.problem: OOM error with 16GB VRAM on aggressive workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Check frame count - workflow may be using entire length of input video by default which causes issues

troubleshooting.problem: PC freezes during generation
troubleshooting.solution: Likely spilling into shared VRAM - use memory management techniques

troubleshooting.problem: Unicode error installing janky_memory_patch.py
troubleshooting.solution: Download file correctly by clicking normally on GitHub then clicking raw download button, not right-click save as

troubleshooting.problem: WanVacePhantomSimpleV2 error 'only integer tensors of a single element can be converted to an index'
troubleshooting.solution: Need images plugged into the phantom image input. VACE references can be empty. Don't plug videos into phantom image input as it causes OOM

troubleshooting.problem: Total steps and split step configuration error
troubleshooting.solution: If total steps is 10 and split step is 10, low noise starts at step 10 but total is 10 - need to adjust steps proportionally

troubleshooting.problem: VACE module producing black outputs
troubleshooting.solution: Looks like when you use an I2V model without a start image - check image inputs

troubleshooting.problem: Segs Detailer doesn't work with Wan/VACE/Phantom
troubleshooting.solution: Use modified Impact Pack fork that bypasses image batch warnings

troubleshooting.problem: SEGS preview node getting stuck on video
troubleshooting.solution: Disable the node or use ImageFromBatch+ with decompose segs to display only one frame

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor size mismatch with crop factor less than 1.5
troubleshooting.solution: Use crop factor between 1.2-1.5, lower values cause size alignment issues

troubleshooting.problem: OOM with Tiled SEGS
troubleshooting.solution: Reduce crop factor to 1.20-1.50 instead of 3.0, and reduce bbox_size to decrease sampling dimensions

troubleshooting.problem: Fun Control creating bright flashes during scene changes
troubleshooting.solution: Model doesn't want to be used for continuation, tends to hide scene changes with bright flashes

troubleshooting.problem: Tensor size mismatch error in DetailerForEach
troubleshooting.solution: Use dimensions divisible by 16, even though VAE encodes to be divisible by 8

troubleshooting.problem: upsample_trilinear3d_out_frame not implemented for 'Byte'
troubleshooting.solution: Update to latest version of forked impact-pack, issue fixed in SAM2 Video Detector node

troubleshooting.problem: Pose rig showing through in final render
troubleshooting.solution: Try random seed, or adjust VACE strength up or down

troubleshooting.problem: MASK to SEGS for Video node not working with detailer
troubleshooting.solution: Connect mask to segs nodes to Tile segs then to Detailer node, use SEGSDetailer For Video (SEGS/pipe) node

troubleshooting.problem: Janky Memory Patcher node missing model input
troubleshooting.solution: Connect a model to the model input of the node

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues after ComfyUI update
troubleshooting.solution: Try increasing buffer GB to 1.0 or 2.0, free up more drive space

troubleshooting.problem: Seed must be between 0 and 2**32 - 1
troubleshooting.solution: Change seed value, user fixed by entering 20000

troubleshooting.problem: Audio crop error with start/end time
troubleshooting.solution: Use mp3 instead of wav, use melbandroformer_fp32 instead of fp16, reset index to 0

troubleshooting.problem: Whisper model loader breaking with symlinked folders
troubleshooting.solution: Create audio_encoders folder in models directory

troubleshooting.problem: Out of memory errors on low RAM systems
troubleshooting.solution: Increase Windows paging file size to 80-96GB instead of default ~25GB. Most OOM issues are due to insufficient swap space, not actual RAM limitations

troubleshooting.problem: RuntimeError about mismatched tensor sizes in WanVacePhantom
troubleshooting.solution: When using multiple WanVacePhantom nodes, put phantom/reference images only in the last node before sampler to avoid latent size conflicts

troubleshooting.problem: HN and LN models flipped causing poor video quality
troubleshooting.solution: Double-check that High Noise and Low Noise models are correctly assigned in workflow - easy mistake that degrades results significantly

troubleshooting.problem: Fireflies/confetti noise with gauss-legendre samplers
troubleshooting.solution: Set eta to 0.0, try different schedules/shifts, avoid steps that are too large

troubleshooting.problem: Mouth movement during silent audio sections
troubleshooting.solution: Use better audio separation (Suno stems work better than open source), check for noise in vocal track during preview

troubleshooting.problem: Dancing fireflies artifacts
troubleshooting.solution: Set ETA to ZERO or increase from 0.25 to fix dancing fireflies issue

troubleshooting.problem: Large steps causing artifacts
troubleshooting.solution: Decreasing shift may help, or increasing number of steps when using only a few steps

troubleshooting.problem: Audio crop error with start/end time
troubleshooting.solution: Ensure start time is less than end time and within audio length bounds

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI workflow loop dependency
troubleshooting.solution: Fixed duration approach (3.88s) avoids loop dependency between Transcribe node and TimecodeFromIndex node

troubleshooting.problem: Mouth movement during silence
troubleshooting.solution: Audio noise can cause unwanted mouth movement - use songs with continuous vocals or reduce background noise

troubleshooting.problem: Empty response from Gemini model
troubleshooting.solution: Pass API key into docker container as well as frontend, turn off screen saver, keep browser connected with credentials available

troubleshooting.problem: Lyrics not concatenated with LLM instructions
troubleshooting.solution: Use concat node to combine lyrics with system prompt instructions before sending to Gemini

troubleshooting.problem: Race condition in workflow execution
troubleshooting.solution: Connect string from Gemini node into negative prompt of first text encoder to prevent timing issues and ensure proper execution order

troubleshooting.problem: Index reset required when stopping before first video completes
troubleshooting.solution: Reset index to 0 if you stop the workflow before the first video is done

troubleshooting.problem: AudioCrop error with start/end time
troubleshooting.solution: Set index to 0, error usually occurs when index is too high

troubleshooting.problem: Missing PromptSplitter node after update
troubleshooting.solution: Delete current custom node folder and re-install via manager, node was moved to correct py file

troubleshooting.problem: Index not advancing between runs on Windows WSL
troubleshooting.solution: Use absolute path format like A:\COMFY_UI\ComfyUI_windows_portable_nvidia\ComfyUI_windows_portable\ComfyUI\output\candyskiesV2

troubleshooting.problem: Memory leak detected with WAN21_Vace model
troubleshooting.solution: Restart ComfyUI. Issue seems related to erroring during encode/sample then fixing workflow and continuing

troubleshooting.problem: Poor results with phantom reference
troubleshooting.solution: Don't use same image for first frame and phantom reference. Use diverse reference images instead

troubleshooting.problem: Workflow conflicts in manager showing old version
troubleshooting.solution: Manager installs latest nodes via git pull but doesn't update version display. Try update still works

troubleshooting.problem: Audio sync issues in longer videos
troubleshooting.solution: VRGameDevGirl84 identified timing issue between runs and is fixing it

troubleshooting.problem: Transcription accuracy issues with non-English songs
troubleshooting.solution: Use context string feature to manually input correct lyrics for each run

troubleshooting.problem: Audio sync issues in later parts of video
troubleshooting.details: The later the video goes on, the mouth is not fully in sync - audio sync issue found and fixed

troubleshooting.problem: Gray banner at top and bottom of video
troubleshooting.details: Gray banners appear even when reference image is cropped and not padded

troubleshooting.problem: Character not matching reference image
troubleshooting.details: If prompt contains character descriptions that conflict with reference image, the prompt overrides the character

troubleshooting.problem: Video flashing at start
troubleshooting.details: Strange issue where start of videos frequently flash - cause unknown

troubleshooting.problem: Character degradation in VACE extend process
troubleshooting.details: Character degradation is intrinsic to VACE extend process, more apparent on darker videos. Slightly better with Fun 2.2 Vace but still present

troubleshooting.problem: Motion and color degradation in extended videos
troubleshooting.details: Color degradation coincides with motion degradation in T2V with repeated prompts and no new images

troubleshooting.problem: No video output despite completion
troubleshooting.details: Sometimes nodes don't show video but file is created - check output folder for video file

troubleshooting.problem: Index node not updating/staying at 0
troubleshooting.solution: Check file path format - use standard Windows path format without double escaping. Ensure output folder exists and is empty

troubleshooting.problem: Audio sync restarting on each chunk
troubleshooting.solution: Usually user error with index node or file path configuration. Ensure no existing videos in folder when starting

troubleshooting.problem: Black screen output with QwenEdit
troubleshooting.solution: Disable sage attention when using QwenEdit models, or check denoise is set to 1.0

troubleshooting.problem: Random pillar/letter boxing appearing
troubleshooting.solution: Appears randomly due to HUMO, no specific fix identified

troubleshooting.problem: Unwanted mouth movement during non-vocal sections
troubleshooting.solution: Remove vocal/singing references from prompts, check for audio noise, or disconnect audio from HUMO for silent sections

troubleshooting.problem: Inconsistent backgrounds across scenes
troubleshooting.solution: Fill context fields manually with consistent background descriptions, or use reference image with desired background

troubleshooting.problem: Start index out of range error
troubleshooting.solution: Disconnect math expression node if connected, issue may resolve itself

troubleshooting.problem: LLM sending wrong number of prompts
troubleshooting.solution: Sometimes LLM sends 12 instead of 16 prompts, causing end segments to use only reference image

troubleshooting.problem: Vace needs a base model to run but workflow errors
troubleshooting.solution: Original Vace model was released as full standalone (Wan 2.1 base + Vace blocks). Kijai separated Vace blocks requiring base model. Use full Vace model file for standalone operation

troubleshooting.problem: Characters look more plastic in Wan output videos
troubleshooting.solution: May be caused by NSFW LORAs. Check if same issue happens with non-NSFW version. Can use reality LORAs or lower shift + Smartphone Snapshot Photo Reality STYLE lora

troubleshooting.problem: Audio sync issues in long videos
troubleshooting.solution: Different audio files have different samples causing sync issues. Need audio cleaning node. Some files work, some don't. Recording with Windows recorder works better

troubleshooting.problem: Face detailer misalignment
troubleshooting.solution: Adjust mask with 'grow mask with blur' options or 'crop_size_mult' values when seeing edge of box

troubleshooting.problem: OOM on RAM with face detailer upscaling nodes
troubleshooting.solution: Bypass face detailer image upscale nodes or try different model. Issue is models not offloading

troubleshooting.problem: Auto-queue not working in V7
troubleshooting.solution: Only fails if files already in folder. Forward slashes on Windows cause issues - use regular file path copy/paste

troubleshooting.problem: Auto-queue not working in fresh ComfyUI install
troubleshooting.solution: Install ComfyUI-Impact-Pack custom node from manager or GitHub (https://github.com/ltdrdata/ComfyUI-Impact-Pack)

troubleshooting.problem: HuMoEmbeds tensor device mismatch error
troubleshooting.solution: Update both wan wrapper and VRGameDevGirl's custom nodes, use latest workflow version (V7.1)

troubleshooting.problem: Frame count mismatch - getting 97 frames instead of 100
troubleshooting.solution: Use 5-second duration instead of 4 seconds, or try 4.2 seconds (105 frames) to avoid rounding issues

troubleshooting.problem: Workflow stopping mid-run with connection error
troubleshooting.solution: ConnectionResetError is usually just a blip and shouldn't stop runs. Check if too many videos in folder are causing confusion.

troubleshooting.problem: Torch compile error on last loop iteration
troubleshooting.solution: Change dimensions to multiples of 32 instead of 16 to fix RoPe function compile errors

troubleshooting.problem: Sync issue in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Remove/fix audio crop node at the end of workflow that was causing timing problems

troubleshooting.problem: Face changes too much during upscaling
troubleshooting.solution: Change start step to 5 instead of default 4 to denoise less, or use LoRA training on the face

troubleshooting.problem: RuntimeError with face detailer batch crop
troubleshooting.solution: Happens when no face detected in some frames, related to pagefile/CPU RAM issues

troubleshooting.problem: Rebooting PC results in faster generation
troubleshooting.solution: Something to do with ComfyUI rather than the workflow - restart helps

troubleshooting.problem: Video duration 3.88 seconds instead of 4
troubleshooting.solution: HuMo requires 4n+1 frames, so 100 frames gets rounded to 97. New system auto-adjusts UP to 101 frames = 4.04 seconds

troubleshooting.problem: Torchaudio.save failing with permissions
troubleshooting.solution: Switch from torchaudio.save to soundfile.write

troubleshooting.problem: FileNotFoundError when ffmpeg not installed
troubleshooting.solution: Updated node now has fallback that uses imageio's built-in ffmpeg automatically

troubleshooting.problem: Triton cache path too long on Windows
troubleshooting.solution: Create shorter torch cache ENV PATH or delete cache content

troubleshooting.problem: Nodes cannot be moved in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Right click and unpin - red pin was added to prevent users from breaking workflow

troubleshooting.problem: Background removal making face bad
troubleshooting.solution: Bypass the background remover nodes if reference image already has desired background

troubleshooting.problem: OOM on second pass with 5090
troubleshooting.solution: Use block swapping if you have enough system RAM, or reduce frame count

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors after adding ComfyUI-WanAnimatePreprocess
troubleshooting.solution: Remove the custom node that was recently added

troubleshooting.problem: NoneType object has no attribute 'add_callback' error
troubleshooting.solution: Try disabling sage_attention and enable_fp16_accumulation

troubleshooting.problem: Model and module confusion in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Module goes into diffusion model selector, the model goes into model loader. Diffusion Model Loader needs full base model, not just extracted VACE blocks

troubleshooting.problem: Random objects (planes, buildings) appearing in second pass
troubleshooting.solution: Turn down LoRA strength to 0.7, or turn off 'add noise to sampling' on low noise pass

troubleshooting.problem: PyTorch 2.8.0 causing issues with 5090 on RunPod
troubleshooting.solution: Roll back to pytorch version 2.7.1+cu128

troubleshooting.problem: Excessive tears in generation
troubleshooting.solution: Add 'NOTE: No tears, no crying!' under emotion setting in prompt creator node

troubleshooting.problem: Time jump 11 frames before end of output
troubleshooting.solution: Happens when images are too similar. Try using different images or adjusting parameters

troubleshooting.problem: Second pass produces random weird characters
troubleshooting.solution: Use WanVacePhantomDualV2 node instead of regular dual node for better compatibility

troubleshooting.problem: DWPose leaking into generation when combined with Depth
troubleshooting.solution: Send each control input as its own Vace input instead of using image blend screen at .5

troubleshooting.problem: Character loses consistency in first 71 frames
troubleshooting.solution: Lower the SHIFT parameter on both Samplers to help retain likeness, experiment with higher total steps and start step

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors on longer generations
troubleshooting.solution: Enable the Block Swap node and set block swap to 30 for 24GB cards

troubleshooting.problem: Outfit doesn't change despite multiple outfit values
troubleshooting.solution: Remove outfit from continuity instruction or add note in character input to override

troubleshooting.problem: ImageResize node invalid data error in V9
troubleshooting.solution: Replace the invalid value with '1' for the per_batch input

troubleshooting.problem: Latent upscaling ghosting
troubleshooting.solution: Use multiple smaller upscaling steps instead of x2 in one go, though this can cause tiling and blur

troubleshooting.problem: Model adds human faces to non-human characters like robots
troubleshooting.solution: Experiment with SHIFT parameter, higher steps, and create custom LoRAs for specific character types

troubleshooting.problem: Square artifacts in half of video output
troubleshooting.solution: Switch resolution to dimensions divisible by 32 (like 1024x576 instead of 1280x720)

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors on newer ComfyUI versions
troubleshooting.solution: Issue identified as ComfyUI problem, not model-specific. Try using GGUFs or adjusting block swap settings

troubleshooting.problem: Flash attention error with SeedVR2 on version 2.8.3
troubleshooting.solution: Revert to SDPA attention or use SeedVR2 v2.5.17 which should work without flash attention

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI crashing with 'Reconnecting' message
troubleshooting.solution: Try simpler native Wan workflows first, check if using correct ComfyUI version (not portable), reduce frame count and dimensions for testing

troubleshooting.problem: VACE overshooting rotation in transitions
troubleshooting.solution: Issue occurs when start and end frames are identical - change end and start frames so they don't match to give VACE different points to interpolate between

troubleshooting.problem: Lip movement when not wanting it
troubleshooting.solution: Don't use audio input or use empty audio input, don't use LightX lora or use at low strength, use CFG with negative prompt describing talking/lip movement for at least few steps, apply Lip Sync Suppressor node

troubleshooting.problem: OOM errors with sequential generation workflow
troubleshooting.solution: Each segment runs independently so if you can run first segment you can run 500th. Often can just run WF again and it will pick up where left off since allocation error usually dumps VRAM

troubleshooting.problem: Static images in extensions after fine initial generation
troubleshooting.solution: Issue was using wrong SVI model - switching back to correct model fixed it. Using 2.2 lora on model based on 2.1 (HuMo) caused problems

troubleshooting.problem: Batches not matching at cut points when upscaling long sequences
troubleshooting.solution: Noise levels don't match between end of previous batch and start of next batch. No clear solution found yet

troubleshooting.problem: VAE not found error in workflow
troubleshooting.solution: VAE wasn't named same and in same directory as workflow expected. Had to go in subgraph to change it or rename VAE file to match

troubleshooting.problem: Audio drift over time
troubleshooting.solution: Audio length needs to be exact multiple of frame count. VRGameDevGirl's HUMO workflow pads tiny amount of silence to make things land perfectly on frame boundaries

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI crashes during long generations
troubleshooting.solution: Use --no-cache argument or remove video preview nodes from workflow to prevent RAM issues

troubleshooting.problem: Audio overlap causing lipsync issues
troubleshooting.solution: Audio encoder should be padded with silence and not have repeated audio, unlike video overlap

troubleshooting.problem: Wrong LoRA causing red/weird outputs
troubleshooting.solution: Use specific SVI LoRA from the workflow notes, not SVIv2 LoRA for low noise sampler

troubleshooting.problem: Device mismatch error
troubleshooting.solution: Route 'denoised' output instead of 'output' from ClownsharkChainsampler

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI Essentials compatibility
troubleshooting.solution: Switch to 'nightly' version in ComfyUI manager to fix math node issues

troubleshooting.problem: WanImageToVideoSVIPro not working
troubleshooting.solution: Remove all kjnodes and reinstall them

troubleshooting.problem: SimpleMath node error 'unexpected keyword argument c'
troubleshooting.solution: Switch ComfyUI_essentials to nightly version or replace with Math Expression node from ComfyUI Custom Scripts

troubleshooting.problem: ComfyUI_essentials causing various node failures
troubleshooting.solution: Remove ComfyUI_essentials package entirely and replace nodes with alternatives from other packages

troubleshooting.problem: TextLineCounter node missing from WAS Node Suite
troubleshooting.solution: Delete WAS folder and manually git clone, or switch to nightly version

troubleshooting.problem: Video flashing/fading transitions with end frames
troubleshooting.solution: Use 2 frames instead of 1 for middle/first/last frames when they don't catch up properly

troubleshooting.problem: Aggressive transition to last frame with Wan 2.2
troubleshooting.solution: Enable t2v lighting lora and adjust both lighting loras strength in high and low pass until finding sweetspot

troubleshooting.problem: VAE is invalid error
troubleshooting.solution: Use Wan2_1_VAE_bf16.safetensors or wan_2.1_vae.safetensors from official repos

troubleshooting.problem: Duration math node attached to batch instead of frame count
troubleshooting.solution: Rewire the duration math node to connect to frame count rather than batch

troubleshooting.problem: Sage attention tensor type errors with GGUF
troubleshooting.solution: Disable sage attention or ensure using sage attention 2++ with proper CUDA/PyTorch versions

troubleshooting.problem: Last frame not working in VACE workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Issue is with Fun VACE 2.2 models - switch to original Wan 2.1 VACE for better inpainting/frame control

troubleshooting.problem: Static degraded animation after first generation
troubleshooting.solution: Was using wrong LoRA - needed to use correct SVI LoRA instead of SVI 2.0 Pro lora for humo-low noise

troubleshooting.problem: Quality degrading in longer extensions
troubleshooting.solution: HuMo has harder time when subject moves farther away or is smaller in frame. Try increasing resolution of generation

troubleshooting.problem: OOM issues on 12GB card with certain workflows
troubleshooting.solution: Use Wan 2.1 instead of 2.2, or put LoRA inline into standard KSampler with proper HI/LO conditioning manipulation

comparisons.comparison: Current VACE vs SkyReels DF model
comparisons.verdict: VACE shows huge improvement - can fix both color shift AND quality degradation that SkyReels DF couldn't handle
res_2m has similar to normal sampler time, res_2s is slower but potentially better quality
RIFE is faster for frame interpolation
TensorRT interpolates 300 frame video in 2 seconds, significantly faster

comparisons.comparison: Hunyuan Vid vs WAN training data
comparisons.verdict: Hunyuan Vid's training dataset seemed more cinematic (possibly torrented movies), does random but accurate cuts/scene changes

comparisons.comparison: VACE vs VEO on volcano/family scenes
comparisons.verdict: VEO volcano effect worse than VACE, but VEO better for family on bench scene
Results just as good as Topaz for upscaling 480p to 1920x1080
LightX gives less real look, nuked prompt adherence compared to 30 steps
Native node workflow runs twice as fast as Kijai's Wrapper
Got better results using LCM/DDIM_uniform combo, but could have been tweaking the lora strength/VACE embed
NormalCrafter has less flickering than Lotus
Preview Animation nodes are lighter and reduce CPU usage significantly
UniPC produces amazing results with FusionX Phantom model, while LCM usually worked better with just Phantom + LightX

comparisons.comparison: Pusa vs regular VACE for extensions
comparisons.verdict: Pusa kills motion when combined with LightXv2 but adding reward, motion boost, movie gen LoRAs brings motion back
res_2s provides dramatic quality jump over Euler, should only be 2x slower, so 5 steps res_2s takes about same time as 10 steps Euler
Vace + Phantom using Wan2.1 work perfectly together. Adding Wan2.2 is much more difficult because we don't have proper models for that yet

comparisons.comparison: Janky Memory Patcher vs Block Swapper
comparisons.verdict: It's not like block swapper, it's not better, it's just another tool with different mechanism

comparisons.comparison: Multi samplers with VACE vs Wan2.2 i2v for chaining
comparisons.verdict: Wan2.2 i2v can handle chaining samplers with flawless transitions, while VACE has noticeable changes in first frame when chaining

comparisons.comparison: Fun Control 2.2 vs VACE for extensions
comparisons.verdict: Fun Control 2.2 is definitely better, especially for scenes with huge color changes
CausVid has better likeness but weaker overall quality, LightX2V hurts likeness but better aesthetic
Euler leaves graininess, uni_pc or res_multistep are same speed and much sharper

comparisons.comparison: V1 vs V2 model for pose control
comparisons.verdict: V2 model fixes pose rig showing through, V1 has this issue more often
gauss_legendre_2s works well for extensions, res_2s and other 2s samplers may work well too but faster, qin_zhang_2s slower but nice quality
HuMo results are quite impressive, at least as good as Infinitetalk, but context windows don't work with HuMo
Significant quality improvement with 3s sampler but much slower (3 model calls per step vs 1)

comparisons.comparison: Linear quadratic vs beta scheduler for low steps
comparisons.verdict: Linear quadratic more appropriate for 4-8 steps, complex schedulers lose benefits at low step counts

comparisons.comparison: Suno stems vs open source audio separation
comparisons.verdict: Suno stems provide better quality separation and help reduce mouth movement during silent sections

comparisons.comparison: WAN 2.2 v10 vs Mega versions for I2V
comparisons.verdict: v10 has dedicated I2V model that's better at keeping features from original image, while Mega versions based on VACE T2V are more capable and flexible but Mega has less I2V noise
HUMO produces better results than InfiniteTalk for lip sync, especially with WAN 2.2, though limited to shorter durations typically
Q6 GGUF should be almost same as checkpoint quality, low quality may be due to other settings
Phantom reference is much better at reference than Vace reference
Community doesn't think 5b is significant compared to 14b HN/LN, 5b doesn't have similar controls for endless travel
1.0 works better for less 'shouty' characters, 2.0 can make heads look like they'll 'flip open'
Vace + Phantom merge works better for character consistency, though prompt adherence may be weaker than 2.2
V6 has better clarity with pusa lora removed, more customizable with new prompt creator
Fun 2.2 Vace much better at following OpenPose conditioning

comparisons.comparison: Krea1 vs Flux images as reference
comparisons.verdict: Krea1 images produce more realistic results than Flux images which look fake
Wan 2.1 face changes completely, Wan 2.2 retains face better but is very slow
LightX + FastWan is 2.2x faster (31.49s vs 70.63s) at 4 steps

comparisons.comparison: 4 steps without FastWAN vs with FastWAN
comparisons.verdict: Without FastWAN gives more cinematic, natural results but takes longer
AIO looks better overall but sometimes adds unwanted skin details, regular model is blurrier but cleaner

comparisons.comparison: WAN 2.1 vs WAN 2.2 with fast LoRAs
comparisons.verdict: 2.1 still preferred in many cases due to slow motion issues with fast LoRAs on 2.2

comparisons.comparison: Individual run segments vs final combined video
comparisons.verdict: Individual segments like video_00003-audio.mp4 maintain sync almost perfectly, while final combined video has sync issues
Closed models have less temporal flickering/popping in details like hair and textures compared to WAN
Chinese and French produce more natural lip-sync results than English, likely due to phoneme training data
Claude is much better at solving code problems that ChatGPT fumbles around
New lora has better quality at 4 steps but is slower, sometimes loads sometimes not
Takes same amount of time as 1280x720, so 1024x576 not worth doing
Q4_K_M works well for 16GB VRAM, but if you have more VRAM use bigger models for better results

comparisons.comparison: WAN 2.2 vs Phantom for character consistency
comparisons.verdict: WAN 2.2 basically breaks phantom, could not see a benefit

comparisons.comparison: Phantom vs VACE for product replication
comparisons.verdict: Phantom is amazingly good at accurately replicating products from references

comparisons.comparison: Gemini 2.5 vs other models for video understanding
comparisons.verdict: Gemini 2.5 overall has the best video understanding from any model currently (besides GPT 5 which has video analysis turned off)
HuMo works much better for lip sync, Wan S2V produces poor quality results
Wan 2.2 is definitely better quality than 2.1
AIO cuts out high model for speed/simplicity which degrades motion, but sits between Wan 2.1 and full 2.2 in quality

comparisons.comparison: LightX LoRA vs standard settings for lip movement
comparisons.verdict: LightX LoRA causes almost unavoidable lip movements, standard CFG settings with negative prompts work better for preventing unwanted speech

comparisons.comparison: Wan 2.2 A14B I2V Low Noise vs Wan 2.1 I2V models
comparisons.verdict: 2.2 I2V LN model is not same or similar to 2.1 I2V-480p or 720p models. The 2.2 I2V LN model cannot generate video by itself, needs HN stage
Takes 85sec to gen 81 frames at 720x720 with 5090
1.3B version is pretty bad compared with 14B, but works on 12GB cards

comparisons.comparison: This workflow vs other lipsync solutions
comparisons.verdict: Haven't found anything that comes close to this workflow in regards to flexibility and creative direction
GGUF: 10:44 execution time, 14.2GB VRAM avg. FP8: 12:28 execution time, 15.5GB VRAM avg. GGUF uses less VRAM but slightly faster

comparisons.comparison: Kijai wrapper vs default ComfyUI nodes for VACE
comparisons.verdict: Default ComfyUI nodes recommended for VACE - better memory usage and performance, Kijai has worse performance and requires manual blockswap

comparisons.comparison: Wan 2.1 vs 2.2 for end frame transitions
comparisons.verdict: Wan 2.2 known for aggressive transitions to last frame, may need lora adjustments
Wan2.1 is 99.9% as good if not better than 2.2 if you do a second sampler pass, and uses less VRAM
Fun VACE 2.2 better at pose control and high noise compatibility, but original VACE better at inpainting tasks
Same output when settings are equal, but Advanced nodes provide more control over reference frame strength and easier setup

tips.tip: Use lower VACE strength for more motion in subsequent passes
tips.context: Set VACE strength to 0.8-0.9 on additional segments (not first) to allow more motion

tips.tip: Use minimal phrasing for segments
tips.context: Since this mode retains visual information, use simple action descriptions like 'The man turns left and opens the door'

tips.tip: Direction-type prompts work best
tips.context: Focus on directional/action prompts rather than complex scene descriptions when using continuation

tips.tip: Fix aspect ratio before processing
tips.context: Use resize node or manual adjustment to fix aspect ratio issues

tips.tip: Use context of 20 for smoother transitions
tips.context: Dial up context to 20 frames instead of default 10 for better transitions between segments

tips.tip: Vary seeds only for terminal tracking
tips.context: Varying seeds between generations helps track progress in terminal but doesn't affect generation quality

tips.tip: Add more prompts to each segment for better results
tips.context: When doing long form i2v with multiple segments

tips.tip: Use ChatGPT to create sequential prompts
tips.context: Give it the start image and have it create continuation prompts

tips.tip: Hook up control_masks inputs
tips.context: Unless leaving them out for specific reason - prevents continuation frames from changing too much

tips.tip: Start simple and save workflows before adding complexity
tips.context: When experimenting with new techniques

tips.tip: Remove 'fixes' that may be making things worse
tips.context: Sometimes original simple approach works better

tips.tip: Use low denoise (0.6) for upscaling
tips.context: When wanting to preserve logo/text details

tips.tip: Use image2image on first frame of control video to style transfer
tips.context: When using inputs that are very different from desired output style

tips.tip: Start with very low resolution and high teacache for fast base generation
tips.context: When wanting to speed up workflow with upscaling approach

tips.tip: Use select_every_nth frame instead of speed changes in external editor
tips.context: When wanting to effectively use every other frame for processing

tips.tip: Use NAG for negative prompting since normal method doesn't work with CFG zero
tips.context: When CFG is set to zero in Wan workflows

tips.tip: Allow video model freedom to use only frames it generates to continue
tips.context: For more natural motion in long video generation

tips.tip: Don't use FusionX for upscaling
tips.context: When doing upscaling workflows

tips.tip: Keep seed and shift consistent throughout generations
tips.context: For successful video extensions with Pusa

tips.tip: Use collage images for multiple characters in Phantom
tips.context: Phantom limited to 4 images but can use collages of multiple characters per image slot

tips.tip: Reduce VACE strength at later steps for better results
tips.context: When experiencing darkness or inpainting weirdness

tips.tip: Don't cast fp8_e4 to fp8_e5
tips.context: You lose precision on model weights for no benefit

tips.tip: Try 12 steps minimum with Euler sampler
tips.context: For better quality when using Euler instead of res_2s

tips.tip: For I2V with Vace, send starting image as first frame without mask, then grey values to other frames with masks
tips.context: When doing image-to-video with VACE

tips.tip: Use openpose without Face points to help with character likeness
tips.context: When control inputs affect character resemblance

tips.tip: Try running Lightx2v/lightning loras at strength=0.5 and CFG=2.0 if CFG=1.0 worsens Phantom resemblance
tips.context: When using speed loras with VACE+Phantom

tips.tip: Send same image multiple times for Phantom subject to potentially improve resemblance
tips.context: When trying to enhance character likeness

tips.tip: Use ImageAndMaskPreview node with opacity 0.4 and red color to visualize mask outputs
tips.context: For debugging mask positioning

tips.tip: Crop characters images similar to the pose you want - do closeup if you have closeup
tips.context: When creating reference collages for VACE

tips.tip: Good prompting and getting trigger phrase for character is important
tips.context: For better character consistency

tips.tip: Use loras more as steps go up
tips.context: When working with character loras on phantom base

tips.tip: Blur background more in post to hide distant face issues
tips.context: When faces at distance break during camera zoom at 16fps

tips.tip: Use higher strengths for openpose with HN model
tips.context: Openpose needs higher strengths to work with HN model and VACE

tips.tip: Start with causvid for first few steps and lightx for the last bit
tips.context: Get best of both worlds for speed and quality

tips.tip: Increase CFG, resolution, and steps for better face consistency
tips.context: When losing face resemblance with speed optimizations

tips.tip: Use manual face masking in Blender with grease pencil
tips.context: For better control than AI segmentation, can interpolate between frames

tips.tip: Use 'combined' setting when you only have one mask - it won't make a difference
tips.context: When working with MASK to SEGS nodes

tips.tip: Replace 'For Video' with 'For AnimateDiff' in your head
tips.context: The 'For Video' naming is confusing, sometimes you want to use it most of the time you don't

tips.tip: Don't have to pass model and conditioning each time unless changing it
tips.context: When using ChainSampler nodes

tips.tip: Phantom prefers simple but real background, VACE reference likes white background
tips.context: When preparing reference images

tips.tip: Send Phantom references as two images in a batch separately instead of concatenated
tips.context: Better approach than making one concatenated image

tips.tip: Prompt is really important for extension workflows
tips.context: Model is kicked in specific direction, conflicting prompts cause weird results

tips.tip: Use spline lines instead of straight lines for easier workflow visualization
tips.context: Makes it easier to see what's connected in complex workflows

tips.tip: Use --cache-none mode for very long workflows
tips.context: When running complex workflows that use many techniques and might fail due to memory issues

tips.tip: Bypass FastWAN LoRA when using 4 steps
tips.context: For 4-step generation workflows, removing the speed LoRA can improve results

tips.tip: Use native ComfyUI LoRA scheduling with Set/Get nodes
tips.context: Create 'before LoRA' and 'after LoRA' model states using Set nodes, then use Get nodes to apply different LoRA strengths to different samplers

tips.tip: Change background throughout generation to reduce degradation
tips.context: Varying the scene during video generation helps prevent progressive control degradation, though doesn't eliminate it completely

tips.tip: Use Banostasis with specific prompt format
tips.context: Start prompt with 'Banostasis concept,' and use 0.45-1.0 strength depending on what looks good with sampler

tips.tip: Separate HN and LN passes for better control
tips.context: Allow early HN steps without distill loras and with CFG 3-3.5 for more stylized aesthetics before applying speed optimizations

tips.tip: Use pad instead of crop for image resize
tips.context: When starting with square or portrait reference photos to avoid cutting off top of head

tips.tip: Pre-generate prompts instead of using LLM nodes
tips.context: Create prompts with GPT/Gemini beforehand separated with | symbol to avoid randomness in long generations

tips.tip: Use default 1.0 strength values for Vace
tips.context: When starting with the Phantom merge

tips.tip: Don't add Vace reference unless you have specific reason
tips.context: When using Phantom merge, use Phantom references like normal

tips.tip: Test Phantom example workflows first before adding Vace
tips.context: Before combining Phantom and Vace functionality

tips.tip: Set Vace strength of Phantom frames to 0.0
tips.context: When using Vace merge, Phantom frames need Vace strength but it's automatically set to 0.0 in background

tips.tip: Ensure only one video in result folder
tips.context: Important for workflow to function properly

tips.tip: Reset index to 0 and clear output folder for new composition
tips.context: When starting a new song/composition

tips.tip: Read all the notes before running the workflow
tips.context: Multiple users missed important configuration details

tips.tip: Use diverse reference images for phantom merge
tips.context: When using vace + phantom merge for character consistency

tips.tip: Add 'multiple people' to negative prompt
tips.context: When using phantom merge to improve character consistency

tips.tip: Don't change control after generation setting
tips.context: Users should leave it on fixed to avoid issues

tips.tip: Use tile sizes that don't evenly divide latent size
tips.context: For upscaling to avoid bad seams - want overlap at edges

tips.tip: Queue runs right away, don't wait for completion
tips.context: You can queue all runs immediately for automated processing

tips.tip: Use headshot or upper body shot for reference images
tips.context: Full body shots where head is very small don't work well as reference

tips.tip: Longer overlaps improve video quality
tips.context: Making overlaps longer gives the model more to work with for better results

tips.tip: Use JSON format for LLM prompts
tips.context: JSON format helps LLMs maintain consistency and structure, especially for lesser models

tips.tip: Keep prompts simple for character descriptions
tips.context: Just use 'the woman' or 'the man' instead of detailed descriptions - let reference image handle character details

tips.tip: Check output folder if video doesn't display
tips.context: Sometimes nodes don't show the video preview but the file is created in the output folder

tips.tip: Match reference image aspect ratio to video
tips.context: Similar aspect ratios between reference and output produce better results

tips.tip: Start with empty folder and only add image and song to workflow
tips.context: When troubleshooting workflow issues

tips.tip: Queue all runs at once instead of waiting between runs
tips.context: For multi-run videos, queue all runs immediately after seeing the run count

tips.tip: Keep face detailer LoRA strength at 1
tips.context: Higher values will look strange

tips.tip: Use 2-3 sentences for prompting
tips.context: For QwenEdit models, doesn't need to be fancy

tips.tip: Remove example references from instruction prompts
tips.context: LLM tends to overuse any examples provided in instructions

tips.tip: Use context options node to fit larger upscales in 16GB VRAM
tips.context: When doing upscaling passes

tips.tip: Use headshot only in reference image for HuMo
tips.context: HuMo tends to follow reference image strongly, full body nude references will override clothing prompts

tips.tip: Prompt explicitly to avoid unwanted hallucination
tips.context: When experiencing unwanted artifacts or changes

tips.tip: Resolution has higher impact than steps
tips.context: For video generation quality vs speed tradeoffs

tips.tip: 480p gets crunchy textures that don't filter out easily
tips.context: 1280 or 1024 resolution handles upscaling better

tips.tip: Add film grain lightly to HN results
tips.context: Helps LN model grip and polish better in dual model workflows

tips.tip: Try 1600x900 resolution for fixing faces at distance
tips.context: 900p fixes faces where 720p doesn't always work

tips.tip: Use headshot reference images for better character consistency
tips.context: Face can get lost with full body shots, headshots maintain character better in HuMo workflow

tips.tip: Keep character descriptions minimal
tips.context: Too much detail in character description makes result look less like reference image

tips.tip: Fix seeds for audio generation to prevent changes between passes
tips.context: When generating audio in same workflow, fixed seeds prevent audio regeneration that could break sync

tips.tip: Use higher shift values for better motion freedom
tips.context: Shift of 9+ gives model more freedom for complex scenes like dynamic motion

tips.tip: 1024x576 is sweet spot resolution
tips.context: Good balance of quality and performance for video generation

tips.tip: Use headshot photo for best character consistency
tips.context: When using reference images, headshots work better than full body shots

tips.tip: Don't describe character details in prompt for consistency
tips.context: Just say 'the woman' or 'the man' to maintain same person throughout video

tips.tip: Test default workflow before making changes
tips.context: Workflow is complex and changes can break functionality

tips.tip: Use context strings to inject LoRA keywords
tips.context: Works for adding specific styling or effects

tips.tip: Go as high as possible with batch size for consistency
tips.context: All frames within batch will be temporally consistent

tips.tip: Clear folder before starting fresh run
tips.context: Prevents merging videos from previous runs

tips.tip: Use different camera angles between scenes to make cuts less noticeable
tips.context: Since each generation starts with reference image, vary camera zoom/angle in prompts

tips.tip: Add extra notes to prevent unwanted elements
tips.context: In prompt creator last string, hit enter then add 'Extra Notes: No tears, no crying' etc.

tips.tip: Use simpler character descriptions with reference images
tips.context: Less detail pulls less away from reference image, let the ref image do the work

tips.tip: Use strict cycle for scene consistency
tips.context: For news anchor or consistent scenes, change list handling to use strict instead of free interpretation

tips.tip: Use block swap 20 and 8 steps for high resolution
tips.context: When using 1280x720 or higher resolutions on RTX 5090

tips.tip: Avoid negative prompting in positive prompts
tips.context: Good chance it will add the things you tell it not to add

tips.tip: Keep outfit descriptions simple
tips.context: Each group is only 4 seconds, too much detail leaves no room for other elements

tips.tip: Use context string for custom prompts
tips.context: Set 'Use context only' to true and connect lyric string to prompt splitter, can turn LLM off

tips.tip: Set Extra Trim to 0 for exact end frame landing
tips.context: When trying to loop videos, bypass 'Remove End Frame' subgraph node

tips.tip: Use 'the woman' instead of detailed character descriptions for better consistency
tips.context: When prompting for character consistency across scenes

tips.tip: Use two reference images - one full body with outfit, one close up
tips.context: For better character and clothing consistency

tips.tip: Delete last frame from inputs to second sampler for better motion
tips.context: So the second sampler runs without the last frame guiding it, just continues the trajectory set from the first sampler
